actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that members of the uniformed services assigned to duty outside the United States shall be eligible for the earned income credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend eligibility for the earned income credit to members of the armed forces assigned to duty outside the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that members of the uniformed services assigned to duty outside the United States shall be eligible for the earned income credit.
